content.data:
TRAVEL INSURANCE CLAIM FORM

Policy Number: GTI-2024-789456
Claimant Name: John Smith
Claim Date: January 15, 2024

CLAIM DETAILS:

Flight Information:
- Flight: AA1234 from New York (JFK) to London (LHR)
- Scheduled Departure: January 10, 2024, 18:00
- Actual Departure: January 11, 2024, 12:00 (18 hour delay)

Expenses Claimed:
1. Hotel Accommodation: $180.00
   - Hotel: Airport Inn, JFK
   - Date: January 10-11, 2024
   - Receipt attached: hotel_receipt.pdf

2. Meals: $65.00
   - Multiple meals during delay period
   - Receipts attached: meal_receipts.pdf

3. Ground Transportation: $25.00
   - Taxi to/from hotel
   - Note: Receipt misplaced

Total Claimed: $270.00

Supporting Documents:
- Airline delay notification (airline_delay_notification.pdf)
- Hotel receipt (hotel_receipt.pdf)
- Meal receipts (meal_receipts.pdf)

I certify that the information provided is true and accurate.

Signature: John Smith
Date: January 15, 2024
